author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
The police have filed a First Information Report (FIR) against MLA Engineer Rashid after a scuffle between him and BJP supporters over a banner showing Prime Minister Narendra Modi with bloodstains.

“Such dirty tricks will not stop me from fighting for the rights of the people of Jammu and Kashmir. New Delhi is forcing the police to curb the rights of Kashmiris,” said Mr. Rahid, who represents Langate in north Kashmir.

The BJP demanded action after the brawl took place in Pulwama district of south Kashmir two days ago. The MLA allegedly threatened a BJP supporter after he objected to the depiction of Mr. Modi in a banner, which read “Mr. Modi stop terrorising Muslims.”
title: FIR filed against MLA Rashid
